page.title: 16LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: The Domesday Project Group in Bellarmine Sec. produced a questionnaire which they distributed to the lst years in the school. 59 boys and 39 girls returned their forms {C0MPUTERS}13 girls and 22 boys have a computer in their home.G=GIRL, B=BOY MAKE G B G B Commodore l 6 Atari l 4 Spectrum 8 ll{ } Other 3 1{ { {HOURS TV WATCHED IN AN EVENING} 1-2 hrs G=9 B=11 2-3hrs G=13 B=18 >3hrs G=16 B=30{ CHANNEL MOST WATCHED GIRLS BBC1=13 STV=25 BBC2=0 C4=0 BOYS " 2 " 37 " 0 " 1 { {FAVOURITE PROGRAMME }G=GRANGE HILL B=MIAMI VICE. {FAVOURITE SOAP OPERA} G=DALLAS, B=BROOKSIDE.{FAVOURITE {CHILDRENS PROG.}G and B = GRANGE HILL. Survey continued on page l7.
